name: Notion Portfolio Template
description: Looking to create a beautiful and effective product design using Notion? Look no further than this free, donation-based Notion UX/UI, Product Design template! Designed by Vivi Shin, a product designer with years of experience crafting user-friendly digital products, this template is the perfect starting point for your digital portfolio. Here are just a few of the key benefits you can expect from my Notion portfolio template:Quickly and easily draft your own portfolio in a digital format Incorpor
features: Quickly and easily draft your own portfolio in a digital format; Incorporate essential elements that showcase your design skills and experience; Get a jumpstart on your portfolio creation process by using the template as a guide; Customize the template to fit your unique style and personal branding; + And much more!
